tit.e: Hyakuman Chobu Kaikon Keikaku (The million hectare development plan)
Hyakuman Chobu Kaikon Keikaku (The million-hectare development plan)
tit.cmt: million hectare→文法的にmillion-hectareもしくは、million hectaresになるので、以下同様にmillion-hectareに統一しました。
tit.e: Hyakuman Chobu Kaikon Keikaku (The million-hectare development plan)

sen.j: 百万町歩開墾計画（ひゃくまんちょうぶかいこんけいかく）とは奈良時代に政府が掲げた計画である。
sen.e: The Hyakuman Chobu Kaikon Keikaku (The million hectare development plan) was a government scheme during the Nara Era.
The Hyakuman Chobu Kaikon Keikaku (The million- hectare development plan) was a government scheme during the Nara Period.
sen.cmt: Nara Era→Nara Period用語統一により変更しました。
sen.e: The Hyakuman Chobu Kaikon Keikaku (The million- hectare development plan) was a government scheme during the Nara Period.

sen.j: 主に奥羽に向け出された。
sen.e: It was mainly directed towards the Ou region.
It was mainly directed towards the Ou region.
It was mainly directed towards the Ou region.

sen.j: 良田百万町歩開墾計画とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It was also called the "Ryoden Hyakuman Choubu Kaikon Keikaku".
It was also called the "Ryoden Hyakuman Choubu Kaikon Keikaku" (Development plan for the million-hectare of fertile field).
sen.cmt: "Ryoden Hyakuman Choubu Kaikon Keikaku"だけでは英文として理解が難しいです。（読みだけを表記する場合、ChoubuはChobuのミススペルです。）（）内に定訳不明ですが、訳を追加しました。
sen.e: It was also called the "Ryoden Hyakuman Choubu Kaikon Keikaku" (Development plan for the million-hectare of fertile field).

sen.j: ただ、百万町歩という数字はほぼ不可能であり、ただの理想、スローガンであるともされている。
sen.e: A million hectares was near impossible, so it may have merely been an idea/slogan that was used.
A million hectares were nearly impossible, so it may have merely been an idea or a slogan.
sen.cmt: was→were文法間違いです。near→nearlyに変更、文法間違いです。an idea/slogan→an idea or a sloganに変更しました。that was used→削除しました。
sen.e: A million hectares were nearly impossible, so it may have merely been an idea or a slogan.

sen.j: 722年（養老6年）閏4月25日、大和朝廷により出された。
sen.e: The plan was unveiled by the Yamato dynasty on April 25th, 722.
The plan was issued by the Yamato dynasty on April 25, 722.
sen.cmt: unveiled→issuedに変更しました。用語統一によりthを削除しました。
sen.e: The plan was issued by the Yamato dynasty on April 25, 722.

sen.j: 内容は以下のとおりである。
sen.e: The plan content was as below.
The plan contents were as below.
sen.cmt: 複数形に変更しました。
sen.e: The plan contents were as below.
(Translated into modern language)
(Translated into modern language)
(Translated into modern language)

sen.j: 陸奥の政情が不安定で人民が定住できにくいために，庸調を免じ，また都へ上っている人々を国へ帰す。
sen.e: To ease social unrest within the Mutsu province and to provide stability to the people, a "choyo" (tax in tribute and labor under the ritsuryo system) will be declared, and all those who come to the capital will be sent back to their land.

To ease social unrest within the Mutsu province and to provide stability to the people, a "choyo" (tax in tribute and labor under the ritsuryo system) will be exempted, and all those who come to the capital will be sent back to their land.
sen.cmt: declared→免じるという意味はありません。誤訳です。exemptに変更しました。
sen.e: To ease social unrest within the Mutsu province and to provide stability to the people, a "choyo" (tax in tribute and labor under the ritsuryo system) will be exempted, and all those who come to the capital will be sent back to their land.

sen.j: 民を10日間労役させて良田百万町を開墾する、国郡司で開墾しない者は罰する。
sen.e: All citizens will be required to work ten days on the development of the Ryoden Hyakumancho, and those who refuse will punished by the district governors.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: All citizens will be required to work ten days on the development of the million-hectare of fertile field, and those who refuse will be punished by the district governors.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処の文ですが、原文の区切りがきっちりなされていなかったので、原文を変更しています。Ryoden Hyakumanchoは日本語のままではなく、訳出した方がいい語句だと思います。will punished→文法ミスです。
sen.e: All citizens will be required to work ten days on the development of the million-hectare of fertile field, and those who refuse will be punished by the district governors.

sen.j: 百姓で3,000石以上の収穫をあげれば勲位六階、1,000石以上は終身庸を免除、八位以上の者は勲位一階を昇叙する。
sen.e: Farmers who contribute crop of over 3000 seki of harvest will be promoted to the sixth court rank, those who contribute over 1000 seki will receive lifelong exemption from paying tribute, and those over the eighth court rank will be promoted one rank.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Farmers who contribute crop of over 3000 koku of harvest will be promoted to the sixth court rank, those who contribute over 1000 koku will receive the exemption for whole life, and those who over the eighth court rank will be promoted one more rank.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処の文ですが、原文の区切りがきっちりなされていなかったので、原文を変更しています。Farmersの前のスペースを削除しました。「石」をsekiとありますが、間違いです→kokulifelong exemption from paying tribute→この文章の意味が分かりません。変更しています。those→whoが抜けています。one rank→one more rankに変更しました。
sen.e: Farmers who contributed a crop of over 3,000 koku from their harvest were promoted to the sixth rank in the kuni (order of merit), those who contributed over 1,000 koku received tax exemption for life, and those who already held the eighth court rank or higher were promoted by one rank in the kuni.
sen.cmt: 3000→3,0001000→1,000court rankは位階のことなので、勲位kuni (order of merit)にしました。the sixth court rank→the sixth rank in kuni (order of merit)庸を免除→tax exemptionone more rank→by one rank時制を過去形に変更

sen.j: 公私の出挙の利は3割とする。
sen.e: The interest rates of all government loans, both public and private, will be set at 30 percent.
The interest rates of all government loans, both public and private, will be set at 30 percent.
The interest rates of all government loans, both public and private, will be set at 30 percent.

sen.j: 辺境の鎮守に食料は重要であるから、その貯えを貢進する者には叙位する。
sen.e: As food is vital for the regiments in outlying regions, all those who contribute towards the provisions will be promoted.
As food is vital for the regiments in outlying regions, all those who contribute towards the provisions will be promoted.
As food is vital for the regiments in outlying regions, all those who contribute towards the provisions will be promoted.

sen.j: 以上の4段からなっている。
sen.e: The above four paragraphs are the outline of the plan.
The above four paragraphs were the outline of the plan.
sen.cmt: are→文法ミスですwereに変更しました。
sen.e: The above four paragraphs were the outline of the plan.

sen.j: しかし現状は、「異常な開墾計画の負担から逃れるため夜逃げする」「全国的に班田農民の浮浪人化問題が浮上する」といった傾向がみられ、結果的に開墾はあまりなされなかった。
sen.e: But the reality was that many fled in the night to avoid the burden of this "unrealistic" land development plan, and throughout the nation farmers of allotted farmland turned towards vagrancy, resulting in little being cultivated.

However, the situations were that 'many farmers skipped out by night to avoid the burden from the development plan' or 'the problem that the farmers of allotted farmland became a vagrant emerged as a social issue' and as a result the development plan was not really carried out.
sen.cmt: But→口語的なのでHowever,に変更しました。原文に忠実に訳されていない事、「」等が反映されていないこと、訳漏れがみられるので全文変更しました。
sen.e: However, the situations were that 'many farmers skipped out by night to avoid the burden from the development plan' or 'the problem that the farmers of allotted farmland became a vagrant emerged as a social issue' and as a result the development plan was not really carried out.

sen.j: 10世紀初めころ編纂された「和名類聚鈔」によると、陸奥国が約5万1,000町，出羽国が約3万6,000余町とあり両国合わせても10万町にも満たないほどであった。
sen.e: According to the "Wamyoruijusho" that was published in the beginning of the 10th century, the Mutsu Province cultivated around 51,000 hectares, the Dewa Province around 36,000, which was a far cry from the original plan of a million hectares.

According to the 'Wamyoruiju-sho' (Kango-Japanese Dictionary) that was published in the beginning of the 10th century, the Mutsu Province cultivated around 51,000 hectares, the Dewa Province around 36,000, which were very different from the original plan of a million hectares.
sen.cmt: "Wamyoruijusho"→' 'の間違いです。'Wamyoruijusho' →'Wamyoruiju-sho' 変更し、英文として理解が難しいので(Kango-Japanese Dictionary)追加しました。was→wereに修正しました。a far cry→口語的なので変更しました。
sen.e: According to the 'Wamyoruiju-sho' (Kango-Japanese Dictionary) that was published in the beginning of the 10th century, the Mutsu Province cultivated around 51,000 hectares, the Dewa Province around 36,000, which were very different from the original plan of a million hectares.

sen.j: また全国でも88万余町で100万町歩に満たず、結果的に失敗となった。
sen.e: The nationwise tally fell short of the million hectares, reaching only 880,000 hectares, and the plan was ultimately a failure.
The nationwide tally fell short of the million hectares, reaching only 880,000 hectares, and the plan was ultimately a failure.
sen.cmt: nationwise→スペルミス？です。nationwideに変更しました。
sen.e: The nationwide tally fell short of the million hectares, reaching only 880,000 hectares, and the plan was ultimately a failure.

sen.j: これが上記のとおり、スローガンであったのではないかとされる所以である。
sen.e: As mentioned earlier, it's widely believed that it was more of a slogan than anything else.
As described above, that is why it may have merely been a slogan.
sen.cmt: it's→省略形を削除しました。全体的に口語的なので変更しました。
sen.e: As described above, that is why it may have merely been a slogan.
